task.title: Convince the coffee machine to work before 9 AM
Teach the office cat to fetch coffee
Find the developer who stole the last slice of pizza
Implement a feature that predicts when the boss will bring donuts
Design a '404 Page Not Found' that tells jokes
Teach the website to play 'Elevator Music' during maintenance
Integrate a 'Mood Swing' detector for the office
Write hilarious error messages for when things go bananas
